author: Justin Hawkins Rides Again
description:
I was dismayed to see the Professor of Rock's posts over the last couple of days - where he explained that it was becoming impossible to show his album countdowns and even an interview without being hit by copyright claims. At one point, he thought he might just stop. I'm glad he's changed his mind, but it's an issue for so many reviewers - it's becoming hard to continue. So what should we do?

To come and see Justin Hawkins Rides Again LIVE across the UK, find tickets here: 
https://www.aegpresents.co.uk/event/justin-hawkins-rides-again/

To see more from JHRA,  join my Patreon here: http://www.patreon.com/jushawk

For Cameo messages: https://www.cameo.com/justinhawkins

The latest Darkness album "Dreams On Toast" is here: https://thedarkness.lnk.to/dreamsontoast/

Get a Justin Hawkins Rides Again T-Shirt & Hoodie here: https://thejawsofvictory

#reaction #musicreview
title: How Do We Make This Work?
